()촀\0When things are weighing upon you,

\0 not long ago I took a

I spent an entire day at a spa all

(\0촀\0And wouldn't you know itn\0\0

\0
(촀\0You really should try it sometime.

(%촀\0The other day, on a whim, (촀\0I just up


\0((5촀\0I was quite impressed with myself.
(\0촀\0But getting a strike without having

When you're feeling down,
\0(5촀\0
it's important to have some

(%촀\0Which is why I recently reserved

(촀\0I spent an hour singing my heart out

(촀\0What a show I must have given

("촀\0I've been hearing ALL about this

\0(촀\0 I hear it

\0
(촀\0In factn\0\0

(촀\0It will be loads of fun, n\0!

(1촀\0n\0\0Ahh, I remember way back when I

(1촀\0n\0\0Hmm. I was just thinking back

\0(촀\0
That was how I found my place in

n\0.
\0 (5촀\0And I'm done

Now,
\0 be honest, n\0n\0\0
(&촀\0What do you think of all this

('촀\0Still,
\0 it's not my cup of tea.

\0Standing there, 

\0why,
\0
(촀\0I'd have no choice but to say yes!

(촀\0I've even given them a try.
Really, I have, n\0.\0\0(촀\0But holding a NookPhone above my

It's justn\0\0every time I try, (촀\0I can never

\0(&촀\0
From above and to the right?

Honestly, my dear,(5촀\0 they all look so

Once upon a time,
\0 (촀\0I fell in love with

\0and bought it on the spot.
(\0촀\0But when I got that table home,
\0
( 촀\0I realized it was so brash it clashed

(촀\0I tried to make it work—
\0and failed.
\0(
()촀\0But while I had to let that handsome

\0I learned a valuable lesson.
(\0촀\0No matter how handsome a table is,
\0(5촀\0

()촀\0You see,
\0 once upon a time, 
\0I owned

\0 it didn't have a shred of

\0(촀\0So,
\0 I grew bored of it.

("촀\0Still,
\0 that chair taught me

('촀\0"Comfortable" is not enough for me,
\0
my dear. 
\0(5촀\0I need somethingn\0\0MORE.

(%촀\0You see, clothing is key to making a

\0 ("촀\0I take great care

(\0촀\0In fact,

\0(촀\0 and snagged it on a tree.

Of course, 
\0now it has a big hole in it.

()촀\0You see, I try to create a look that is

\0and yet seems

($촀\0See, whether my look is "elegant and

("촀\0That's why I'm experimenting

\0 ()촀\0I caught up with

("촀\0One of my old friends was always
